forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 12 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco awakens under a sky that promises a delightful afternoon. With a gentle breeze from the southwest, the air carries a hint of salt and life, brushing against the skin with just enough coolness to remind one that summer, though near, has yet to fully embrace the city. The high rests comfortably in the mid-sixties, coaxing residents outdoors. Today’s sunshine breaks through moments of cloud cover, creating a canvas of shifting light that accentuates the city’s iconic contours. As the afternoon unfolds, the temperature retreats slightly, wrapping the day in a calm, refreshing coolness.

Come evening, expect a shroud of clouds to gently fall over the city, ushering in a low that whispers of warmth while still preserving the crisp edge of early evening. The west-southwest winds continue their playful dalliance, urging one to keep a light jacket or sweater close at hand, particularly if one wishes to linger at cafés or stroll along the waterfront. Given these conditions, this is an ideal day to explore the lesser-known nooks of the city, perhaps the quiet corners of Golden Gate Park or the vibrant streets of the Mission District. Seek the solace of local bookstores or indulge in a leisurely afternoon at an outdoor patio, where the flavors of the city can be savored without the bustle of ordinary life.
